trans-unit.source: Holds an existing collection structure, such as an <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> or a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>, to be used inside a <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CompositeCollection"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the collection to add.

## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| ## XAML Text Usage In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you can use the syntax to bind to a collection.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> type.
The collection to add.
The default is an empty collection.
Occurs when the contained collection changes.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer.Collection*> dependency property.
To be added.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer.CollectionChanged"></xref> event.
The event data.
Handles events from the centralized event table.
The type of the <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"></xref> calling this method.
This only recognizes manager objects of type <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.CollectionChangedEventManager"></xref>.
The object that originated the event.
The event data.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the listener handled the event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer.Collection*> property should be persisted.
This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer.Collection%2A> property does not have a simple default value.
This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value.

You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer> or developing your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property value has changed from its default; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
The type of the <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"></xref> calling this method.
This only recognizes manager objects of type <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.CollectionChangedEventManager"></xref>.
Object that originated the event.
Event data.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the listener handled the event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
